mantis_monitor.formatter.formatter.Formatter¶

class mantis_monitor.formatter.formatter.Formatter¶

This is the generic form for a formatter; use as an interface

Variables:

implementations – List of all registered Formatter classes

__init__()¶

Init the object

Sets the name to an empty string

Methods

__init__()

Init the object

get_formatter(name)

Using the string name of a Formatter implementation, return the object

open(filename)

Take the Formatter file format or type and transform it to the UDF

register_formatter(name, formatter_class)

Register a new formatter class

save(filename, data)

Take the UDF and transform it to the desired Formatter file format or type

Attributes

implementations

static get_formatter(name)¶

Using the string name of a Formatter implementation, return the object

Parameters:

name (str) – Name of the Formatter to return

Returns:

Formatter.implementations[name]()

Return type:

Formatter() class object

open(filename)¶

Take the Formatter file format or type and transform it to the UDF

Parameters:

filename (str) – Path to the location of the file to read

Returns:

None

static register_formatter(name, formatter_class)¶

Register a new formatter class

Call this at the end of your new-formatter.py file

Parameters:

  • name (str) – New name for the formatter

  • formatter_class (Formatter()) – Formatter class made for registration

save(filename, data)¶

Take the UDF and transform it to the desired Formatter file format or type

Parameters:

  • filename (str) – Path to the location of the new file

  • data (pandas.DataFrame()) – UDF Pandas DataFrame

Returns:

None
